definition: (of opposing teeth, or gears) to mesh/to engage
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: A new type of arc cycloidal internal meshing rotary pump was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对一种新型圆弧摆线内啮合转子泵进行了研究。

sentences.english: The modification of gear is a principal method for improving performance of meshing.
sentences.chinese: 齿面修形是提高齿轮副啮合性能的重要手段。

sentences.english: A principle of self-position meshing track for conveyer chain has been proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了跟踪运输链节的“滚动啮合自位跟踪”原理。

sentences.english: A new numerical computing method suitable for all kinds of cylindrical worm gearing is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的计算圆柱蜗杆副啮合的数值计算方法。

sentences.english: The basic principle of the worm gearing is analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了该失配啮合传动的基本原理。

sentences.english: Therefore gear-shape engagement is made between the end surface of interior ring of bearing and baffle ring.
sentences.chinese: 为此将轴承内圈端面与挡圈之间制成齿状啮合。

sentences.english: If the big gear did not engage with the small one, the machine would refuse to work.
sentences.chinese: 如果大齿轮与小齿轮不相啮合的话，机器就不会工作。

sentences.english: The method can he used for estimating the machine efficiency of a gear pump with external mesh.
sentences.chinese: 并可用于估算外啮合齿轮泵的机械效率。

sentences.english: One cogwheel engages with the next.
Meshing spur gears must have the same diametral pitch.
sentences.chinese: 互相啮合的直齿圆柱齿轮，必须具有相同的径节。

sentences.english: This wheel engages with that wheel and turns it.
sentences.chinese: 这轮子与那轮子啮合并使它转动。

sentences.english: There is something wrong with this machine, the wheels aren't meshing properly with each other.
sentences.chinese: 这台机器出了毛病，齿轮相互间啮合不当。

sentences.english: The process of double-face engagement is described in details in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 双面无侧隙啮合是热滚挤加工的一个特点。

sentences.english: The teeth on those two wheels mesh as the wheels revolve.
sentences.chinese: 轮子转动时，那两个轮子上的齿就啮合了。

sentences.english: Based on gear engagement theory, the exact model of gear teeth is produced.
sentences.chinese: 根据齿轮啮合原理，建立了轮齿的精确齿形。

sentences.english: In this paper, the authors analyze the space mesh of error helical gear transmission by using kinematics.
sentences.chinese: 本文用运动学法进行了有误差斜齿轮的空间啮合分析。

definition: (of uneven surfaces) to fit together/(of gear wheels) to mesh/(dentistry) occlusion/bite
